Isabelle Randeblad

Front-End Web Developer

Malmö, Sweden

About

Hi there! I'm a recent graduate of General Assembly's Front-End Web Development program, where I honed my skills in crafting clean, user-friendly designs. I'm proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, and Git, with a passion for creating seamless and engaging user experiences.

I had the pleasure of co-developing LanguaMate AI, where I focused on the front-end development, bringing ideas to life while my partner handled the back-end.

With over eight years of experience in customer service, I approach my work with a friendly and approachable attitude, always striving to build websites that are not only visually appealing but also easy and enjoyable to use.

Projects

LanguaMate AI

This web app was created as a final project in my course at General Assembly. It is a website aimed at helping language teachers creating word lists with AI generated definitions and example sentences. With fun games and crosswords to make it easy for
the students to practice and learn the new vocabulary.
